price: Nereye bakarsan orada pek çok nimetler ve büyük bir saltanat görürsün.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
